content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-10.0, y=-50.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-10.5, y=-48.5) which is responsible for inserting items into the furnace
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-8.5, y=-49.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-7.5, y=-49.5) which transfers items from the chest
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-5.5, y=-49.5) which transfers items from the belt to the chest

### Belt Groups
- BeltGroup 1: Connects positions (x=-15.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-13.5, y=-54.5) and (x=-12.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-10.5, y=-54.5) in a rightward direction, consisting of 4 belts
- BeltGroup 2: Connects positions (x=-21.5, y=-51.5) to (x=-19.5, y=-51.5) in a rightward direction and (x=-15.5, y=-51.5) to (x=-15.5, y=-53.5) in an upward direction, consisting of 13 belts
- BeltGroup 3: Connects positions (x=-14.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-16.5, y=-50.5) in a leftward direction and (x=-16.5, y=-55.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-55.5) in a rightward direction, consisting of 10 belts
- Individual Belt: Connects positions (x=-9.5, y=-53.5) to (x=-9.5, y=-55.5) in an upward direction

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items from non-existent entities
- Ensure that the target entity exists and contains the items you wish to extract before attempting extraction.

### Errors when finding nearest entities
- Verify that the entity you are trying to find exists on the map. If not, consider placing the entity first or checking the map data for its presence.

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Before placing an entity, check that the target tile is free of other objects to avoid placement conflicts.

### Errors when connecting belts directly to chests
- Use an inserter to connect belts to chests, as belts cannot be directly connected to chest entities.
